mapper.select: select plandetail_country, count(plandetail_country) as cnt from plandetail group by plandetail_country
select buddy_country, count(buddy_country) as cnt from buddy_country group by buddy_country
select mem_gender, count(mem_gender) as cnt from members group by mem_gender
select mem_birthYear, count(mem_birthYear) as cnt from members group by mem_birthYear order by mem_birthYear

select NVL(count(*),0) from (select distinct r.*, s.mem_id from seller s, accom a, room r, ( select NVL(z.room_num, -1) room_num from ( select rs.room_num room_num from rsvn rs, rsvnPay rp where rs.rsvn_num = rp.rsvn_num and rp.rsvnPay_stat = 0 and rs.rsvn_checkin between to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1) or rs.rsvn_checkout - 1 between to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1) )z right outer join dual on 1 = 1 )aa where s.sell_num= a.sell_num and a.accom_num= r.accom_num and r.roomChk = 0 and r.room_capa >= 1 and r.room_num not in aa.room_num and r.room_num = 1)

select NVL(count(*),0) from (select distinct r.*, s.mem_id from seller s, accom a, room r, ( select NVL(z.room_num, -1) room_num from ( select rs.room_num room_num from rsvn rs, rsvnPay rp where rs.rsvn_num = rp.rsvn_num and rp.rsvnPay_stat = 0 and rs.rsvn_checkin between to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1) or rs.rsvn_checkout - 1 between to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1) )z right outer join dual on 1 = 1 )aa where s.sell_num= a.sell_num and a.accom_num= r.accom_num and r.roomChk = 0 and r.room_capa >= 1 and r.room_num not in aa.room_num and r.room_num = 1 and mem_id=#{mem_id} )
select NVL(count(*),0) from room r, seller s, accom a where a.sell_num=s.sell_num and a.accom_num=r.accom_num and s.mem_id=#{mem_id}
select NVL(sum(rsvnPay_total), 0) from rsvnPay where to_char(rsvnPay_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and rsvnPay_stat=0
select NVL(sum(rsvnPay_total), 0) from rsvnPay where to_char(rsvnPay_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{rsvnPay_date} and rsvnPay_stat=0

select NVL(sum(p.rsvnPay_total), 0) from rsvn r, rsvnpay p, room rm, accom a, seller s where r.rsvn_num=p.rsvn_num and r.room_num=rm.room_num and rm.accom_num=a.accom_num and a.sell_num=s.sell_num and to_char(rsvnPay_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and rsvnPay_stat=0 and s.mem_id=#{mem_id}

select NVL(sum(p.rsvnPay_total), 0) from rsvn r, rsvnpay p, room rm, accom a, seller s where r.rsvn_num=p.rsvn_num and r.room_num=rm.room_num and rm.accom_num=a.accom_num and a.sell_num=s.sell_num and to_char(rsvnPay_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{rsvnPay_date} and rsvnPay_stat=0 and s.mem_id=#{mem_id}
select * from (select aa.*, rownum rnum from(select * from rsvnPay order by rsvnpay_date desc)aa) where rnum<6

select * from ( select aa.*, rownum rnum from ( select P.RSVNPAY_ID, R.mem_id, p.rsvnpay_total, p.rsvnpay_stat, to_char(P.RSVNPAY_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') RSVNPAY_DATE from rsvnPay p, rsvn r, room rm, accom a, seller s where p.rsvn_num=r.rsvn_num and r.room_num=rm.room_num and rm.accom_num=a.accom_num and a.sell_num=s.sell_num and s.mem_id=#{mem_id} order by rsvnpay_date desc )aa ) where rnum<6
select NVL(sum(adInfo_hit), 0) from adInfo where adInfo_date=#{adInfo_date}
select NVL(sum(adInfo_click), 0) from adInfo where adInfo_date=#{adInfo_date}
